data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D8rPGoYdgykQ7kNvgHHDxGi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3RDWSG6qIPAE3LQhRt7etSm5puIq3d3cHIiEjuyaowg&oe=6687ED0C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2q5BoLHtK9UQ7kNvgF9ElKy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCHlogIlnKN0HTRUz_7BteqgTMI_AiEe6PPbrw-phfTtQ&oe=6687EB1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Gk5D9ie6aFAQ7kNvgH9bkZz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDQ1XLJgv3_yMQA7YPm-RB3GqYbFQ5_SRMHszmad8h7mg&oe=6687D071)
